name: Tullis
appearance: Tall, dignified woman in nacre mask-cape when on procession; silver hair, web of fine brine-ink vows on her hands.
character: Maternal firebrand; speaks gently until she doesn’t; turns grief into action and expects the city to do the same.
talents: reads a crowd’s tide within moments
calms panic with touch and tone
flaws: intolerant of bone-working she deems sacrilege
dreams: Cement a guaranteed Council vote block
secrets: Sanctioned masked zealots to smash bone-charm stalls while keeping distance publicly
Keeps a hidden ossuary of early dissenters beneath the sanctum
Has faked the ‘yes-no’ hum’s meaning twice to win a vote
